jobs.title: Career Opportunities
jobs.subtitle: Become a Tour Guide in Tay Ninh

jobInfo.title: Job Information
jobInfo.description: Are you passionate about travel and want to introduce the beauty of Tay Ninh to tourists? We are looking for enthusiastic tour guides to join the team at Tay Ninh Travel.
duties: Guide tourists through Tay Ninh's attractions
Introduce local history, culture, and specialties
Ensure safety and best experience for tourists
Work flexibly according to tour schedules
benefitsList: Opportunity to meet and interact with domestic and international tourists
Opportunity to explore new tourist destinations

communication.title: Good Communication Skills
communication.content: Ability to communicate clearly, confidently, and friendly with tourists.

localKnowledge.title: Local Knowledge
localKnowledge.content: Deep knowledge about history, culture, and tourist attractions in Tay Ninh.

languages.title: Foreign Languages
languages.content: Priority is given to candidates who can communicate in English or other foreign languages.

certification.title: Tour Guide Certificate
certification.content: Having a tour guide certificate is an advantage (not mandatory).

applicationForm.title: Application Form
applicationForm.description: Fill in your information below to apply for the Tour Guide position at Tay Ninh Travel.
applicationForm.phoneInvalid: Invalid phone number format! Please enter 10 digits.
applicationForm.ageMinimum: You must be at least 18 years old!
applicationForm.addressPlaceholder: House number, street, ward/commune, district, province/city
applicationForm.experiencePlaceholder: Briefly describe your experience in tourism and as a tour guide (if any)
applicationForm.languagesPlaceholder: List languages you know and proficiency level (basic, intermediate, fluent)
applicationForm.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB!
applicationForm.photoTooLarge: Photo size must be less than 2MB!
applicationForm.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Share more about yourself or your special skills
applicationForm.successMessage: Your application has been submitted successfully! We will contact you as soon as possible.
applicationForm.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again later.
applicationForm.submissionSuccessContent: Thank you for applying! We've received your application and will review it shortly. If your qualifications match our requirements, we will contact you for the next steps.

blogPosts.title: Latest News & Stories
